topic.title: Opening the Current Document in System Application

keywords.indexterm: Editopen the currently document in the system application
File MenuView in Browser System Application

body.p: To open the currently edited document in the associated system application, use the View in Browser/System Application action that is available in the File XML menu and on the File toolbar. If you want to open XML files in a specific internet browser, instead of the associated system application, you can specify the internet browser to be used. To do so, , then go to Global and set it in the Default Internet browser field General Web Browser . This will take precedence over the default system application settings.
